title: A New Procedure Could Expand Reproductive Choices for Transgender Women
description: Retrieving viable sperm from men with low fertility and from people who have used estrogen therapy for years has been a challenge, doctors say. A new, less invasive technique has promise.
dc:creator: Jacqueline Mroz
media:credit: Jackie Molloy for The New York Times
media:description: Chaya Rothschild, an andrologist at Maze Health in Manhattan, extracted sperm from an ejaculate sample in a process called extended sperm search and microfreeze.
